entry.title: Exploring the Homebrew Codebase #0
entry.content:
Hello, there!

Iâ€™ve decided to write a series of blogs to document my experience of going through the Homebrew/brew repository. Hopefully, it should turn out as a pretty good starting point for someone planning to explore the Homebrew codebase.

For starters, Homebrew is the best package manager for macOS out...
